metadata.title: CVE-2022-48712 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ext4:fix error handling in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode() Current code does notfully takes care of krealloc() error case, which could lead to silentmemory corruption or a kernel bug. This patch fixes that. Also it cleans upsome duplicated error handling logic from various functions infast_commit.c file.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
